How to play it ? :

Follow Screen Instructions and use H or T keyboards !
Game is around 53 mb to load and there is two version + artwork and the anime bonuses so be patient.
Tip : NewGame plus animation doesnt show what to Tap but you can choose H or T .

HammerA is an Universe revolving around Nails , Hammers and woods , an universe were Nails who are used to Hold the Wood world suddenly became alive and tried to escape causing many incidents.
Hammergirls are heroes who holds special Hammers used for those giant Nails.
This "Interactive Anime" is a dream of one of those heroines and it's an infinite loop ! Tap well to unlock the entire Anime !

Inspired by old Mega CD games (yes yes )
